name: captrue-image-for-ts

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon -e ts --exec ts-node-esm src/main.ts
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon -e ts --exec ts-node-esm src/test.ts
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rm -rf ./lib & mkdir lib & tsc

description: A general crawler program written in typescript language
author: AaronCastle <aaroncastle@163.com>
